title: Walkable Ancient Capital
subTitle: 古都文青散策：巷弄與建築
intro: Designed for those who love walking, architecture, and photography. Explore the high density of historic sites in the West Central District without the need for a car.
transportation: Fully walkable. **YouBike 2.0** is highly recommended for short distances.

spots.name: Chihkan Tower & God of War Temple (赤崁樓 & 祀典武廟)
spots.description: The center of power during the Dutch and Zheng eras. The gardens of Chihkan and the red walls of the War Temple are visual highlights.

spots.name: West Market (西市場 - 大菜市)
spots.description: Reopened in 2025 after restoration. A century-old market combining traditional fabric stores with modern creativity in a beautiful white Mansard-style building.

spots.name: Tainan Art Museum Bldg 2 (台南市美術館2館)
spots.description: A modern white landmark perfect for escaping the midday sun. Afterwards, walk to the nearby Confucius Temple district.

spots.name: Hayashi Department Store (林百貨)
spots.description: Visit the rooftop shrine of this 1930s department store at sunset. Great for buying high-quality souvenirs.

spots.name: Shennong Street (神農街)
spots.description: A beautifully preserved old street lit by lanterns at night. Book a spot at 'Bar TCRC' in advance for world-class cocktails.

title: Eco-Tunnel & Maritime History
subTitle: 生態與海洋歷史：台版亞馬遜
intro: From the 'Mini Amazon' green tunnel to the historic roots of Anping. This route is perfect for families and nature lovers.
transportation: Take a **Taxi/Uber** to Sicao (public transport is infrequent), then return to Anping.

spots.name: Sicao Green Tunnel (四草綠色隧道)
spots.description: Arrive early! Take a bamboo raft through the mangrove forest. The reflections on the water create a dreamlike 'Mini Amazon' scene.

spots.name: Anping Tree House (安平樹屋)
spots.description: A former warehouse swallowed by banyan roots. The skywalk allows you to wander through the tree canopy.

spots.name: Anping Old Fort (安平古堡)
spots.description: The origin of Taiwan's history. Explore the remnants of Fort Zeelandia and the surrounding old streets (Yan-zhi Lane is quieter).

spots.name: Big Fish Blessing (大魚的祝福)
spots.description: Enjoy the sunset at this iconic whale-shaped installation or head to Yuguang Island nearby.

title: Art Hub & Old City Life
subTitle: 藝文特區 x 古都生活：經典與現代
intro: Combines Tainan's two strongest museum parks with deep city exploration. Experience the contrast between European grandeur and old Taiwanese alleys.
transportation: Day 1: Train to **Bao'an Station** or Taxi. Day 2: **Walking/YouBike**.

spots.name: Chimei Museum (奇美博物館)
spots.description: Houses Asia's strongest collection of Western art and weaponry. The architecture resembles a grand European palace.

spots.name: Ten Drum Rende Creative Park (十鼓仁糖文創園區)
spots.description: An old sugar factory turned into a creative park with extreme slides and world-class drum performances. Stay for the night lights.

spots.name: Guohua Street Food (國華街美食)
spots.description: Start your day like a local. Try 'Fusheng Bowl Rice Cake' (富盛號碗粿) or 'Jinde Spring Rolls' (金得春捲).

spots.name: Tainan Art Museum Bldg 1 (台南市美術館1館)
spots.description: A classic Art Deco building integrated with modern design. Don't forget to visit the Confucius Temple across the street.

title: Salt Fields & Mud Springs
subTitle: 山海連線：鹽田夕陽 x 泥漿溫泉
intro: A journey from the coastal salt fields to the mountain hot springs. Perfect for travelers seeking grand landscapes and relaxation.
transportation: **Car Rental** is essential for this route.

spots.name: Jingzaijiao Tile-paved Salt Fields (井仔腳瓦盤鹽田)
spots.description: Taiwan's oldest salt field. The sunset reflecting on the grid-like salt pans is a photographer's dream.

spots.name: Garden Night Market (花園夜市)
spots.description: Open Thu/Sat/Sun. Remember the chant 'Da-Da-Wu-Hua-Da-Hua-Hua' to know which night market is open!

spots.name: Guanziling Hot Spring (關子嶺溫泉)
spots.description: One of the few mud hot springs in the world. Enjoy the 'Weng Zai Ji' (Roast Chicken in Jar) for lunch nearby.

spots.name: Water and Fire Spring (水火同源)
spots.description: A geological wonder where natural gas and spring water coexist, allowing fire to burn on water.

title: The Full Tainan Experience
subTitle: 台南完全攻略：全方位深度遊
intro: Covering history, art, nature, and nightlife. The best choice for first-time visitors wanting a deep understanding of Tainan.

spots.name: Anping Tree House & Old Fort (安平樹屋 & 古堡)
spots.description: Spend the afternoon exploring the roots of Taiwan's history. Try 'Win Chang Beef Soup' (文章牛肉湯) for dinner.

spots.name: Chimei Museum & Ten Drum (奇美博物館 & 十鼓)
spots.description: Dedicate a full day to these two massive parks. They offer completely different vibes: Classical Art vs. Industrial Cool.

spots.name: West Market & Snail Alley (西市場 & 蝸牛巷)
spots.description: Experience the texture of life in Tainan. Hunt for art installations in Snail Alley and buy souvenirs at Hayashi Dept. Store.

title: Foodie & Photographer Route
subTitle: 老饕與攝影師路線：巷弄光影
intro: Focuses on 'Eating' and 'Shooting'. Avoids overcrowded spots to find the real atmosphere of Tainan's alleys and ecology.
transportation: **Scooter Rental** or **Uber** is highly recommended for flexibility.

spots.name: Xiluodian Beef Soup (西羅殿牛肉湯)
spots.description: A great alternative to the overcrowded Liuqian Beef Soup. Pair it with a photo walk to the nearby 'Xufeng House' (旭峯號).

spots.name: Taijiang National Park Visitor Center (台江遊客中心)
spots.description: Famous for its white stilt houses on water, perfect for photography. Combine this with the Sicao Green Tunnel boat ride.

spots.name: Jiuling Restaurant (鷲嶺食肆 - 鶯料理)
spots.description: A restored Japanese garden restaurant behind the Weather Museum. Enjoy a refined afternoon tea before heading home.
